name: Banana Pudding Ice Cream
author: FLAME673
summary: A easy, creamy ice cream dessert perfect for the summer.
ingredients: ½ cup packed light brown sugar
directions: Combine half-and-half, brown sugar, white sugar, and salt in a saucepan over medium-low heat; cook and stir until sugars are dissolved, about 5 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and pour 1/2 the mixture into a large bowl; whisk eggs into mixture until well combined
Transfer egg mixture back into saucepan with remaining half-and-half mixture; stir in cream
Cook and stir mixture over medium-low heat until cream mixture is thickened and coats the back of a spoon, 5 to 10 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and stir in vanilla extract
Pour cream mixture over a fine mesh sieve into a bowl; cool to room temperature
Stir mashed bananas into cooled cream mixture
Pour banana cream mixture into an ice maker and freeze according to manufacturer's instructions
Fold vanilla wafers into ice cream during the last 5 to 10 minutes of freezing
